attributes.action: arrange for Dave Benson Phillips to be awarded a posthumous knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Co-creator of the "Awuga" catchphrase, still often used in playgrounds to this day, along with Craig Charles, Kris Akabusi and the Fash, DBP brought light children's entertainment into the 1990s with a bang. As a pioneer of gunge-based humour, a philosophy that young pretenders Ant & Dec carried on, his passing has affected everyone and has left a massive hole in the TV schedules. 

We say that the UK must recognise his efforts to bring smiles to all he encountered with a knighthood.

Awuga Dave, Awuga.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
